enhanced_by.reason: The equals method should be tested in conjunction with hashCode to ensure consistency between the two methods as per the contract of the Object class.
The toString method provides a string representation of the object, which can be used to verify the state of the object before and after the equals method is called.
The getOldValue method can be used to verify the state of the oldValue field before and after the equals method is called.
The getNewValue method can be used to verify the state of the newValue field before and after the equals method is called.
The getType method can be used to verify the state of the type field before and after the equals method is called.
